metadata.name: Pepe Champion
metadata.description: In the land of memes, there were two powerful beings: Pepe the frog and Doge. For centuries, they coexisted in a fragile peace, but whispers of a great battle between them had been spoken of in hushed tones since the beginning of time. As the day of reckoning drew near, the memes of old prophesized of an epic kick that would signal the start of the ultimate showdown. And so it came to pass that Pepe, fueled by a burning desire for dominance, launched himself towards Doge with a mighty kick that shook the very foundations of the internet. The battle had begun, and the fate of the meme world hung in the balance.
